title: OXO On 2-Slice and 4-Slice Motorized Toaster Details
description:
Everybody’s definition of “perfect” toast is a little different. Some like it dark, some light, and others somewhere in between. 
The OXO 2-Slice and 4-Slice Motorized Toasters have nine digital settings, allowing everyone to find their perfect shade. Want more control? The LED countdown shows exactly how much time is left, but our take-a-peek feature lets you check in on the toasting progress mid-cycle; the “a little extra” function will give you extra toasting if you want it.
Defining “perfect” toast is up to you; delivering it is up to us!
